import React,{useState,useContext,useRef} from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import axios from 'axios' import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import Context from './Context' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state let context = useContext(Context) let id = context.user || null let userid = id.user_id || null console.log(id) let url2 = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' let [image,setImage]=useState([0,1]) let [star,setStar] = useState(0) let [writing,setWriting]=useState('') let pk = data.id let sender = {userid,pk,writing,star} let image1 = useRef(null) let image2 = useRef(null) let image3 = useRef(null) let imageHandler=()=>{ image1.current.click() console.log(image1.current.value) } console.log(image,'list') return (
{ setImage([...image,0]) console.log(image) }} className="review-image" src={`${url2}${data.image}`} alt=""/>

{data.name}

{data.story}

setWriting(e.target.value)} value={writing} placeholder="Write your own review" type="text" className="rev">
{/* */}
console.log(image1.cureent.value)} className="input1" ref={image1} type="file"/>
) } export default Reviewer
